forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A good deal of sunshine. High 23C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 72F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low around 50F. NW winds shifting to SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 25C. ENE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 76F. ENE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 74F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
